author: Reuters Editorial
title: Francia, Tesoro colloca totali 7,497 mld euro nuovo Oat febbraio 2021, Oat marzo 2023 e marzo 2024 Estere
text: PARIGI, The Treasury sold the following government bonds at auction on Thursday. OAT AUCTION DATE 18 JAN 2018 MATURITY 25/02/21 COUPON 0.00 PCT SALE AMOUNT 3.530 BLN EUR BID AMOUNT 7.228 BLN EUR BID-TO-COVER 2.048 AVERAGE YIELD -0.24 PCT NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS NONE LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 100.74 PCT AT LOWEST PRICE* 100.00 PCT *Prices above got allotments in full PAYMENT DATE 22/01/18 LAST AUCTIONED PRIOR YIELD OAT AUCTION DATE 18 JAN 2018 MATURITY 25/03/23 COUPON 0.00 PCT SALE AMOUNT 2.680 BLN EUR BID AMOUNT 5.746 BLN EUR BID-TO-COVER 2.144 AVERAGE YIELD 0.10 PCT NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS NONE LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 99.46 PCT AT LOWEST PRICE* 100.00 PCT *Prices above got allotments in full PAYMENT DATE 22/01/18 LAST AUCTIONED 16/11/17 PRIOR YIELD -0.13 PCT OAT AUCTION DATE 18 JAN 2018 MATURITY 25/05/24 COUPON 2.25 PCT SALE AMOUNT 1.287 BLN EUR BID AMOUNT 3.186 BLN EUR BID-TO-COVER 2.476 AVERAGE YIELD 0.23 PCT NON-COMPETITIVE BIDS NONE LOWEST ACCEPTED PRICE 112.64 PCT AT LOWEST PRICE* 49.59 PCT *Prices above got allotments in full PAYMENT DATE 22/01/18 LAST AUCTIONED PRIOR YIELD Details of the auction can be found on page
